name: database
description: | Concept | Description | |----------|-------------| | **Purpose** | Databases are used in software applications to store, manage, and retrieve data. | | **Persistence** | Storage is persistent â€” data is preserved between user visits and across the application. | | **Structure** | Databases offer a structured way to store data, often within tables. | | **Data Types** | Different data types can be stored and enforced in a database. | | **Schema** | Every database has a schema that defines the shape and structure of the data within it. |
